panels.description:
Metric used: process_uptime_seconds

Displays how long this pod has been up.
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description:
Metric used: process_start_time_seconds

Displays the time that this pod started.
panels.title: Start time

panels.description:
Metrics used: jvm_memory_used_bytes, jvm_memory_max_bytes

Displays a percentage of how much of the JVM heap is currently in use.
panels.title: Heap used

panels.description:
Metrics used: jvm_memory_used_bytes, jvm_memory_max_bytes

Displays the percantage of the non-heap memory that is currently being used by the JVM.
panels.title: Non-Heap used

panels.description:
Metric used: http_server_requests_seconds_count

Displays the rate of HTTP requests that are being made towards this microservice.
panels.title: Rate

panels.description:
Metric used: http_server_requests_seconds_count

Displays the rate of HTTP error responses that this microservice is producing.
panels.title: Errors

panels.description:
Metrics used: http_server_requests_seconds_sum, http_server_requests_seconds_count, http_server_requests_seconds_max

Displays the average and the max HTTP request response time of this microservice.
panels.title: Duration

panels.description:
Metrics used: jvm_memory_used_bytes, jvm_memory_committed_bytes, jvm_memory_max_bytes

Displays the overall count of the max, commited and used memory bytes in the heap of the JVM in this microservice.
panels.title: JVM Heap

panels.description:
Metrics used: jvm_memory_used_bytes, jvm_memory_committed_bytes, jvm_memory_max_bytes

Displays the overall count of the max, commited and used non-heap memory bytes in the JVM of this microservice.
panels.title: JVM Non-Heap

panels.description:
Metrics used: jvm_memory_used_bytes, jvm_memory_committed_bytes, jvm_memory_max_bytes

Displays the overall total count of the max, commited and used memory bytes in the JVM of this microservice.
panels.title: JVM Total

panels.description:
Metrics used: process_memory_vss_bytes, process_memory_rss_bytes, process_memory_swap_bytes

Displays the total VSS, RSS and swap memory bytes used in the JVM of this microservice.
panels.title: JVM Process Memory

panels.description:
Metrics used: system_cpu_usage, process_cpu_usage, process_cpu_usage

Displays the CPU usage of the JVM, broken down into the system usage, the process usage and the hourly average process usage.
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description:
Metrics used: system_load_average_1m, system_cpu_count, system_cpu_usage

Displays the average system load, the total number of CPUs in use by the JVM and also the CPU usage of the JVM.
panels.title: Load

panels.description:
Metrics used: jvm_threads_live_threads, jvm_threads_daemon_threads, jvm_threads_peak_threads, process_threads

Displays the number of live, daemon and process threads in use in the JVM. This graph also displays the max process threads that were in use in the JVM.
panels.title: Threads

panels.description:
Metrics used: jvm_threads_states_threads

Displays the count of threads in the different thread state categories currently being used in the JVM.
panels.title: Thread States

panels.description:
Metric used: logback_events_total

This graph is reading all of the log events that happen in this microservice and we can see the amount of log events categorised by the log level.
panels.title: Log Events

panels.description:
Metrics used: process_files_open_files, process_files_max_files

Displays the current count of open file descriptors in the JVM and also the max amount of file descriptors that the JVM can handle being open.
panels.title: File Descriptors

panels.description:
Metric usage:  jvm_memory_used_bytes, jvm_memory_committed_bytes, jvm_memory_max_bytes

Displays the total memory bytes used by the JVM and also the total committed bytes and the max bytes that can be used by the JVM.
panels.title: $jvm_memory_pool_heap

panels.description:
Metrics used: jvm_memory_used_bytes, jvm_memory_committed_bytes, jvm_memory_max_bytes

Displays the JVM metaspace memory separated by the bytes used, committed and the max amount.
panels.title: $jvm_memory_pool_nonheap

panels.description:
Metrics used: jvm_memory_used_bytes, jvm_memory_committed_bytes, jvm_memory_max_bytes

Displays the JVM metaspace memory separated by the bytes used, committed and the max amount.
panels.title: $jvm_memory_pool_nonheap

panels.description:
Metrics used: jvm_memory_used_bytes, jvm_memory_committed_bytes, jvm_memory_max_bytes

Displays the JVM metaspace memory separated by the bytes used, committed and the max amount.
panels.title: $jvm_memory_pool_nonheap

panels.description:
Metric used: jvm_gc_pause_seconds_count

Display the rate the garbage collection has to complete operations.
panels.title: Collections

panels.description:
Metrics used: jvm_gc_pause_seconds_sum, jvm_gc_pause_seconds_count, jvm_gc_pause_seconds_max

Displays the average rate of garbage collections actions and the maximum amount of time that these operations took.

names: max end of major GC (Allocation Failure)

panels.title: Pause Durations

panels.description:
Metric used: jvm_gc_memory_allocated_bytes_total, jvm_gc_memory_promoted_bytes_total

Displays the total byte that have been added to the young generation pool after garbage collection (allocated) and the number of bytes that have been added to the old generation (promoted) after garbage collection.
panels.title: Allocated/Promoted

panels.description:
Metric used: jvm_classes_loaded_classes

Displays the amount of classes loaded by the JVM.
panels.title: Classes loaded

panels.description:
Metric used: jvm_classes_loaded_classes

Displays the change of the amount of classes loaded by the JVM.
panels.title: Class delta

panels.description:
Metric used: jvm_buffer_memory_used_bytes, jvm_buffer_total_capacity_bytes

Displays the bytes used in the JVM buffer and the max bytes allowed to be used in the JVM buffer.
panels.title: Direct Buffers

panels.description:
Metric used: jvm_buffer_count_buffers

Displays an estimate to the amount of buffers in the JVM.
panels.title: Direct Buffers

panels.description:
Metric used: jvm_buffer_memory_used_bytes, jvm_buffer_total_capacity_bytes

Displays the amount of mapped bytes used and the max amount of mapped bytes in the JVM of this microservice.
panels.title: Mapped Buffers

panels.description:
Metric used: jvm_buffer_count_buffers

Displays the estimated mapped buffer count in the JVM of this microservice.
panels.title: Mapped Buffers
